testSteps.Step_Desc: 1. Navigate to the login page. [Acceptance Criteria: TS10]
2. Enter valid email and password at maximum allowed length. [Test Data: user@example.com / 128-character password] [Acceptance Criteria: TS10]

testSteps.Expected: 3. User is logged in if credentials are valid.
